title: RansomEye Alert
description: Frozen schema for alerts. All fields are mandatory. No optional fields allowed. Alerts are immutable facts.

alert_id.description: Unique identifier for this alert (UUID v4)

incident_id.description: Incident identifier this alert relates to

policy_rule_id.description: Policy rule identifier that triggered this alert

risk_score_at_emit.description: Risk score at time of alert emission

explanation_bundle_id.description: Explanation bundle identifier (SEE) - mandatory, no alert without explanation

routing_decision_id.description: Routing decision identifier from policy engine

emitted_at.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of alert emission

immutable_hash.description: SHA256 hash of alert content (immutability guarantee)

prev_alert_hash.description: SHA256 hash of previous alert for same incident (chainable per incident)
